quotes.message: A mother is always the beginning. She is how things begin.
quotes.name: Amy Tan

quotes.message: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: Mother love is the fuel that enables a normal human being to do the impossible.
quotes.name: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.message: Most mothers are instinctive philosophers.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: There is only one pretty child in the world, and every mother has it.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Youth fades; love droops, the leaves of friendship fall; A mother's secret hope outlives them all.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: A mother is one to whom you hurry when you are troubled
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Before a day was over, Home comes the rover, For mother's kiss â€” sweeter this Than any other thing!
quotes.name: William Allingham

quotes.message: A mother's arms are more comforting than anyone else's.
quotes.name: Princess Diana

quotes.message: Who fed me from her gentle breast And hushed me in her arms to rest, And on my cheek sweet kisses prest? My Mother.
quotes.name: Ann Taylor

quotes.message: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love, and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.name: Stevie Wonder

quotes.message: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Only mothers can think of the future-because they give birth to it in their children.
quotes.name: Maxim Gorky

quotes.message: A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dates all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: A good mother is irreplaceable.
quotes.name: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.message: My mother is my friend who shares with me her bread.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Blessed is a mother that would give up part of her soul for her children's happiness.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: My mom is a lifelong smile in my heart, her voice a comfort to my soul, her hugs my ladder to the stars.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Being a full-time mother is one of the highest salaried jobsâ€¦ since the payment is pure love.
quotes.name: Mildred B. Vermont

quotes.message: Mothers care in volumes of tears and earnestness of prayers and a depth of emotion others cannot fathom.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: I will look after you and I will look after anybody you say needs to be looked after, any way you say. I am here. I brought my whole self to you. I am your mother.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: The sweetest sounds to mortals given are heard in Mother, Home, and Heaven.
quotes.name: William Goldsmith Brown

quotes.message: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: A man loves his sweetheart the most, his wife the best, but his mother the longest.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: Motherhood is near to divinity. It is the highest, holiest service to be assumed by mankind.
quotes.name: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.message: Mother is the name for god on the lips and hearts of all children
quotes.name: Brandon Lee

quotes.message: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
quotes.name: Meryl Streep

quotes.message: A mother loves her children unconditionally. However they wrong her, she'll carry on loving them.
quotes.name: Alaa Al Aswany

quotes.message: There's nothing like your mother's sympathetic voice to make you want to burst into tears.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: This heart, my own dear mother, bends, with love's true instinct, back to thee!
quotes.name: Thomas Moore

quotes.message: There is no velvet so soft as a mother's lap no rose as lovely as her smile, no path so flowery as that imprinted with her footsteps.
quotes.name: Archibald Thompson

quotes.message: My mother had a great deal of trouble with me, but I think she enjoyed it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A mother is not a person to lean on, but a person to make leaning unnecessary.
quotes.name: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.message: There's no way to be a perfect mother and a million ways to be a good one.
quotes.name: Jill Churchill

quotes.message: A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.
quotes.name: Tenneva Jordan

quotes.message: This is what we do, my mother's life said. We find ourselves in the sacrifices we make.
quotes.name: Cammie McGovern

quotes.message: My mother is my teacher, her words make me richer, I thank you oh my mother, may you grow and live long!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: In a child's eyes, a mother is a goddess. She can be glorious or terrible, benevolent or filled with wrath, but she commands love either way. I am convinced that this is the greatest power in the universe.
quotes.name: N.K. Jemisin

quotes.message: But the mother's yearning, that completest type of the life in another life which is the essence of real human love, feels the presence of the cherished child even in the debased, degraded man.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: A mother's love perceives no impossibilities.
quotes.name: Paddock

quotes.message: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Mothers were the only ones you could depend on to tell the whole, unvarnished truth.
quotes.name: Margaret Dilloway

quotes.message: Mothers and their children are in a category all their own. No love so instantaneous and forgiving.
quotes.name: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.message: Mothers and their children are in a category all their own. There's no bond so strong in the entire world. No love so instantaneous and forgiving.
quotes.name: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.message: Mothers are like glue. Even when you can't see them, they're still holding the family together.
quotes.name: Susan Gale
